name: River Rally
overview: 2 PLAYER GAME: Race against each other to find location of the sunken money (marked by $ sign). Drive your boat over it to pick up and take money to your own bank on your section of screen. The other player may steal money from you by crashing into you. RAMPS enable boats to leap over river banks, MINES can be dropped using the fire button. Be careful not to run into your own mines or the ducks and crocs. 1 PLAYER GAME: Try to find as many bags of money in the limited time and drop them your own bank. Only one bag is visible at any one time (in both versions). You have target of 9 bags to find. MUSIC: Press any key to turn music off/on. CONTROLS: Push forward on joystick to speed up, back to slow down. Firebutton drops mines.
